books <- read.csv(file.choose())
library(recommenderlab)
library(caTools)
library(Matrix)
View(books)
str(books)
hist(books$ratings)
books_matrix <- as(books,"realRatingMatrix")
View(books_matrix)
books_pop <- Recommender(books_matrix,method="POPULAR")
books_recom <- predict(books_pop,books_matrix[1251],n=3)
as(books_recom,"list")
books_recom1 <- Recommender(books_matrix,method="UBCF")
books_recom2 <- predict(books_recom1,books_matrix[1251], n=5)
as(books_recom2, "list")
